author: Elizabeth Chuck
title: Sheltering in place — with your ex-wife? Pandemic poses challenges for divorced parents
description: The coronavirus outbreak has closed family courts, shuttered neutral meeting places where child exchanges typically happen and raised the health risks of shuttling children from one home to the other.
content:
Despite having divorced in 2014, Henry and Lisa Drake still see each other most days.
Henry picks up their son after school and stays with him at Lisa's until she comes home. Their 9-year-old, Alex, sleeps at his mom's during the week and spends every other … [+10057 chars]
